gov.nasa.gsfc.nisgs.dsm.agent
Class Hoover

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.gsfc.nisgs.dsm.agent.Hoover

public class Hoover
extends java.lang.Object

Hoover deletes old files and cleans the database.

Version:
3.13c Delete files AFTER I update the database, not before. Doing it before causes race conditions., 3.19 Added creation date to Pass. Delete passes by creation date., 3.19b Fixed deletion of Contributors and Thumbnails., 3.20 Delete on deleteMark=1 products & ancillaries. Expanded ancillary keyword deletions.
